name: Allison of Astra: The Marvelous Mrs. Mendel (S1 E7)
name_original: Allison of Astra: The Marvelous Mrs. Mendel (S1 E7)
description:
In the season finale, Margarita is teleported to the fantasy world of her dreams, but things don't work out the way she hoped.

Contains a full Allison Of Astra adventure for your NES, plus the creative stamp program MESS MAKER!

Try before you buy: play the browser version here!
